Restructuring specialists boost Hong Kong staff as China property crisis stokes demandGlobal restructuring specialists Alvarez & Marsal and Houlihan Lokey have boosted headcount in Hong Kong as China's property crisis results in a surge in debt restructuring deals - making them a rare bright spot in hiring for the city's financial sector. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 23:28:09 GMT ZJYN4OOITFJOLMDT7ZXQNRLRBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/restructuring-specialists-boost-hong-kong-staff-china-property-crisis-stokes-2024-02-26/Scott Murdoch, Clare Jim世界中国
Brazil's BRF ends seven-quarter losing streak as turnaround pays offBrazilian poultry and pork processor BRF SA turned a profit of 823 million reais ($165.26 million) in the final three months of 2023, according to an earnings statement on Monday, ending a seven-quarter losing streak. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 23:02:54 GMT KI53WEY6CVMBZG4SLSBPJLODBE https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/brazils-brf-ends-seven-quarter-losing-streak-earns-16526-million-q4-2024-02-26/Ana Mano市场商品
US Senate panel sets hearing on China's Wuxi Apptec, BGI billThe U.S. Senate panel said on Monday that it will hold a hearing on March 6 on a bill that would prohibit federal agencies from contracting with China's BGI, Wuxi Apptec and other biotechnology companies of concern. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:59:21 GMT RFMKWJ53JJNOXCV2BHCQPWH32M https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/us-senate-panel-sets-hearing-chinas-wuxi-apptec-bgi-bill-2024-02-26/Reuters商业医疗保健与制药
Chinese airlines can boost US flights to 50 per week, US saysChinese passenger airlines will be allowed to boost their weekly round-trip U.S. flights to 50 starting on March 31, up from the current 35, the U.S. Transportation Department said on Monday, returning the market to about one-third of pre-pandemic levels. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:23:32 GMT CBXJPSU5Q5ICZJFUHDDMUJYLV4 https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/chinese-passenger-airlines-can-increase-number-us-flights-usdot-2024-02-26/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Cuba's top cigar maker smokes sales record on booming high-end demandCuba's top cigar maker Habanos said on Monday its sales had soared to a record $721 million in 2023, a benchmark the company's executives attributed to booming demand for its most luxurious, high-end smokes in markets including China. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 22:16:20 GMT 52KWS2KNDNKLZGMXJVMCVC4VRU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cubas-top-cigar-maker-smokes-sales-record-booming-high-end-demand-2024-02-26/Dave Sherwood世界美洲
